description: This action returns the following for a given blockchain network:

parameters.name: ownerFilter
parameters.description: The contract or wallet address on the blockchain network by which to filter the request. You must specify the address property of the ownerFilter when listing balances of tokens owned by the address. The contract or wallet address.

parameters.name: tokenFilter
parameters.description: The contract address or a token identifier on the blockchain network by which to filter the request. You must specify the contractAddress property of this container when listing tokens minted by a contract. The blockchain network of the token. contractAddress (string) --- This is the address of the contract. tokenId (string) --- The unique identifier of the token.

nested_params.name: network
nested_params.description: The blockchain network of the token.

nested_params.name: contractAddress
nested_params.description: This is the address of the contract.

nested_params.name: tokenId
nested_params.description: The unique identifier of the token.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of token balances to return. Default: 100

nested_items.name: tokenBalances
nested_items.description: An array of TokenBalance objects. Each object contains details about the token balance.

nested_items.name: ownerIdentifier
nested_items.description: The container for the identifier of the owner.

nested_items.name: address
nested_items.description: The contract or wallet address for the owner.

nested_items.name: tokenIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier for the token, including the unique token ID and its blockchain network.

nested_items.name: network
nested_items.description: The blockchain network of the token.

nested_items.name: contractAddress
nested_items.description: This is the token's contract address.

nested_items.name: tokenId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the token.

nested_items.name: balance
nested_items.description: The container of the token balance.

nested_items.name: atBlockchainInstant
nested_items.description: The time for when the TokenBalance is requested or the current time if a time is not provided in the request.

nested_items.name: time
nested_items.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The Timestamp of the last transaction at which the balance for the token in the wallet was updated.

nested_items.name: time
nested_items.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve.
